p: Linoleic acid (C18:2) was present in amounts ranging from 0.50–1.14 g/100 g d.b. throughout all samples, with a mean of 0.68 and a standard deviation (SD) of 0.16 ( Table 3). For comparison, the USDA National Nutrient Database reports 1.04 g/100 g d.b. for product N. 20076 “wheat, durum” and the INRAN food composition tables report 1.36 g/100 g d.b. for durum wheat. Neither database reports any information on standard errors for all acids.
